articles.title: Mission to counter conspiracy to alter demography soon: PM Modi
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced that the Centre is preparing to launch a mission to thwart a conspiracy to alter the demography of border areas with the help of infiltrators. He stated that those sheltering infiltrators are conspiring to change the demography of areas bordering Bangladesh. [1, 10, 11]

articles.title: New Nepal PM Sushila Karki vows to follow protesters' demands to 'end corruption'
articles.description: Nepal's new interim Prime Minister, Sushila Karki, has vowed to address protesters' demands to end corruption. Karki, a former Chief Justice, has been tasked with restoring order ahead of elections in six months. [1, 3, 5, 11]

articles.title: Suspect in assassination of Charlie Kirk arrested
articles.description: Authorities have arrested Tyler Robinson, a 22-year-old man from Utah, in connection with the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. Robinson's father reportedly urged him to turn himself in. [4, 7, 9, 10, 12, 13]
